attributes.action: allow Boundary Commission proposals to be accepted automatically
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Whilst the current Boundary Commission proposals can be delayed through procedure, parliamentary "point making" and other delaying tactics, political parties are choosing their candidates based on assumed new boundaries. 

By allowing proposals to be automatically legally binding, un-necessary time wasting and cost is immediately stopped in waiting for the already accepted proposals to be given parliamentary time.
